title: dIna rakSakA dEsha
sahitya:
dIna rakSakA dEsha samrakSakA tIgu nIngi nanmai Ongat-tuNai sheivAi


anupallavi

  jnAna jyOtiyE agjnAnam pOkkuvAi nAyaDimait-tuyar pOi ozhiya sheivAi


caraNam    cintaiyil unnai vandanam purindE dEsha sEvai sheyya Ashai koNDuLOm
bandham aTra sutantaram aruLvAi bhAratam purinda pArthasArathiyE
